item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X ðŸŒ„
item.description: This strange device was found at the center of the blast zone and appears to have contained most of the kinetic energy. It glows with an eerie light and seems to repel objects with unseen force. Could it be a weapon? A protective device? Or something else entirely?
